name: STRAGEDYbeta
description:
the year is xxxx. technology has advanced. space travel has not. wars are never won.the world is in question and under horrible dictatorship more freedoms as well as lives are being lost every single moment of every day. one super power of government is creating a super soldier program. performing terrible experiments on the people is normal,and making genetic copies of deceased and extinct superior races of mankind's likeness,bringing the dead back to life is their goal.using artificial intelligence they are playing as gods they are not god
the average person can not tell what is technology and what is real life or just a dream. the super soldier program must be annihilated in order to procure the future for the entirety of worlds. your name is xxxx. you were sent here to xxxx by xxxx from xxxx. you were randomly selected as well as your place of origin.unlike the soldiers you will be facing, there is nothing special about you the only way out of this is by your will alone you do not have a choice. if you wish to stand a chance.go to the tutorial screen.

use xinput gamepad to play
